verses.verse: (For the choir director; on the Gittith. [A Psalm] of Asaph.) <S%H7442>Sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> our <S%H5797>strength;<s%> <S%H7321>Shout<s%> <S%H7321>joyfully<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
<S%H8628>Blow<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> at the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon,<s%> At the <S%H3677>full<s%> <S%H3677>moon,<s%> on our <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
For it is a <S%H2706>statute<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> An <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

He <S%H7760>established<s%> it for a <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> When he <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H5921>throughout<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8193>language<s%> that I did not know: <S%H3045><s%>
"I <S%H5493>relieved<s%> his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%> of the <S%H5447>burden,<s%> His <S%H3709>hands<s%> were <S%H5674>freed<s%> from the <S%H1731>basket.<s%>

"You <S%H7121>called<s%> in <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> and I <S%H2502>rescued<s%> you; I <S%H6030>answered<s%> you in the <S%H5643>hiding<s%> <S%H5643>place<s%> of <S%H7482>thunder;<s%> I <S%H974>proved<s%> you at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Hear,<s%> O My <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will <S%H5749>admonish<s%> you; O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you would <S%H8085>listen<s%> to Me!
"Let there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> among you; <S%H3808>Nor<s%> shall you <S%H7812>worship<s%> any <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H410>god.<s%>

"I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> am your <S%H430>God,<s%> Who <S%H5927>brought<s%> you up from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H7337>Open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7337>wide<s%> and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> it.
"But My <S%H5971>people<s%> did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to My <S%H6963>voice;<s%> And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did not <S%H14>obey<s%> Me.
"So I <S%H7971>gave<s%> them <S%H7971>over<s%> to the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> To <S%H1980>walk<s%> in their own <S%H4156>devices.<s%>
<S%H3863>"Oh<s%> that My <S%H5971>people<s%> would <S%H8085>listen<s%> to Me, That <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H1870>ways!<s%>
"Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> would <S%H3584>pretend<s%> <S%H3584>obedience<s%> to Him; And their <S%H6256>time<s%> [of punishment] would be <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
"But I would <S%H398>feed<s%> you with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat;<s%> And with <S%H1706>honey<s%> from the <S%H6697>rock<s%> I would <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> you."
